title: Executive Order 5106-Excluding the Territory of Alaska from Operation of Public Water Reserve No. 107
content: Executive order of April 17, 1926, creating public water reserve No. 107, is hereby modified so as to exclude the Territory of Alaska from the operation thereof.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5106-Excluding the Territory of Alaska from Operation of Public Water Reserve No. 107 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/360815
